hasDitaContent.@value: Celecoxib causes bleeding, as can trastuzumab emtansine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Celecoxib   causes   bleeding, as can   trastuzumab emtansine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Celecoxib increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises caution.
